cards.rules_text: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is 3 plus the number of creatures that died this turn.

Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each worship counter on this enchantment.

Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, put a card revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library, then return the creature to its owner's hand.

When this enchantment enters, exile all creature cards from your graveyard.
At the beginning of your end step, you may put a creature card exiled with this enchantment with mana value X or less into its owner's graveyard, where X is the total amount of life your opponents lost this turn. If you do, create a tapped token that's a copy of it.

Whenever an opponent gains life, draws a card, or creates a creature token during their turn, you do the same.
Whenever you lose life, discard a card, or sacrifice a creature during your turn, each opponent does the same.

Whenever this enchantment enters or a creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a crime counter on this enchantment.

If you would gain life, gain twice that much life instead.
If you would draw one or more cards, draw twice that many cards instead.
